trans-unit.resname: C15·1 | Bastion Protector | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bastion Protector

trans-unit.resname: C15·1 | Bastion Protector | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Commander creatures you control get +2/+2 and have indestructible.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的指挥官生物得+2/+2且具有不灭异能。

trans-unit.resname: C15·2 | Dawnbreak Reclaimer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dawnbreak Reclaimer

trans-unit.resname: C15·2 | Dawnbreak Reclaimer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nAt the beginning of your end step, choose a creature card in an opponent's graveyard, then that player chooses a creature card in your graveyard. You may return those cards to the battlefield under their owners' control.
trans-unit.target: 飞行在你的结束步骤开始时，选择任一对手坟墓场中的一张生物牌，然后该牌手选择你坟墓场中的一张生物牌。你可以将这些牌在其拥有者的操控下移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: C15·3 | Grasp of Fate | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Grasp of Fate

trans-unit.resname: C15·3 | Grasp of Fate | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, for each opponent, exile up to one target nonland permanent that player controls until CARDNAME leaves the battlefield. (Those permanents return under their owners' control.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，为每位对手各进行以下流程～放逐至多一个目标由该牌手操控的非地永久物，直到CARDNAME离开战场为止。

trans-unit.resname: C15·4 | Herald of the Host | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Herald of the Host

trans-unit.resname: C15·4 | Herald of the Host | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying, vigilance

trans-unit.resname: C15·4 | Herald of the Host | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Myriad (Whenever this creature attacks, for each opponent other than defending player, you may create a token that's a copy of this creature that's tapped and attacking that player or a planeswalker they control. Exile the tokens at end of combat.)
trans-unit.target: 繁影（每当此生物攻击时，对防御牌手之外的每位对手而言，你可以派出一个为此生物复制品的衍生物，其为横置且正向该牌手或某个由他操控的鹏洛客进行攻击。在战斗结束时，放逐这些衍生物。）

trans-unit.resname: C15·5 | Kalemne's Captain | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Kalemne's Captain

trans-unit.resname: C15·5 | Kalemne's Captain | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Vigilance\n{5}{W}{W}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)\nWhen CARDNAME becomes monstrous, exile all artifacts and enchantments.
trans-unit.target: 警戒{5}{W}{W}：蛮化3。（如果此生物未蛮化，则在其上放置三个+1/+1指示物且它已蛮化。）当CARDNAME蛮化时，放逐所有神器和结界。

trans-unit.resname: C15·6 | Oreskos Explorer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Oreskos Explorer

trans-unit.resname: C15·6 | Oreskos Explorer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, search your library for up to X Plains cards, where X is the number of players who control more lands than you. Reveal those cards, put them into your hand, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，从你的牌库中搜寻至多X张平原牌，X为操控之地比你多的牌手数量。展示这些牌，将它们置于你手上，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: C15·7 | Righteous Confluence | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Righteous Confluence

trans-unit.resname: C15·7 | Righteous Confluence | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once.
trans-unit.target: 选择三项。你可以多次选择同一项。

trans-unit.resname: C15·7 | Righteous Confluence | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: • Create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance.
trans-unit.target: •派出一个2/2白色，具警戒异能的骑士衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: C15·7 | Righteous Confluence | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: • Exile target enchantment.

trans-unit.resname: C15·7 | Righteous Confluence | Card Text | Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: • You gain 5 life.

trans-unit.resname: C15·8 | Shielded by Faith | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Shielded by Faith

trans-unit.resname: C15·8 | Shielded by Faith | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature has indestructible.\nWhenever a creature enters the battlefield, you may attach CARDNAME to that creature.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物所结附的生物具有不灭异能。每当一个生物进战场时，你可以将CARDNAME结附在该生物上。

trans-unit.resname: C15·9 | Aethersnatch | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Aethersnatch

trans-unit.resname: C15·9 | Aethersnatch | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Gain control of target spell. You may choose new targets for it. (If that spell becomes a permanent, it enters the battlefield under your control.)
trans-unit.target: 获得目标咒语的操控权。你可以为它选择新的目标。（如果该咒语成为永久物，则它会在你的操控下进战场。）

trans-unit.resname: C15·10 | Broodbirth Viper | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Broodbirth Viper

trans-unit.resname: C15·10 | Broodbirth Viper | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Myriad (Whenever this creature attacks, for each opponent other than defending player, you may create a token that's a copy of this creature that's tapped and attacking that player or a planeswalker they control. Exile the tokens at end of combat.)\nWhenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 繁影（每当此生物攻击时，对防御牌手之外的每位对手而言，你可以将一个衍生物横置放进战场且正对该牌手或由他操控的某个鹏洛客进行攻击，该衍生物为此生物的复制品。在战斗结束时，放逐这些衍生物。）每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，你可以抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: C15·11 | Gigantoplasm | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gigantoplasm

trans-unit.resname: C15·11 | Gigantoplasm | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You may have CARDNAME enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it has "{X}: This creature has base power and toughness X/X."
trans-unit.target: 你可以使CARDNAME当成战场上任一生物的复制品来进入战场，但它具有「{X}：此生物的基础力量与防御力为X/X。」

trans-unit.resname: C15·12 | Illusory Ambusher | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Illusory Ambusher

trans-unit.resname: C15·12 | Illusory Ambusher | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)

trans-unit.resname: C15·12 | Illusory Ambusher | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME is dealt damage, draw that many cards.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME受到伤害时，抓等量的牌。

trans-unit.resname: C15·13 | Mirror Match | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mirror Match

trans-unit.resname: C15·13 | Mirror Match | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Cast this spell only during the declare blockers step.\nFor each creature attacking you or a planeswalker you control, create a token that's a copy of that creature and that's blocking that creature. Exile those tokens at end of combat.
trans-unit.target: 只能于宣告阻挡者步骤中施放CARDNAME。对每个攻击你或由你操控之任一鹏洛客的生物而言，将一个衍生物放进战场且阻挡该生物，此衍生物为该生物的复制品。在战斗结束时，放逐这些衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: C15·14 | Mystic Confluence | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mystic Confluence

trans-unit.resname: C15·14 | Mystic Confluence | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once.
trans-unit.target: 选择三项。你可以多次选择同一项。

trans-unit.resname: C15·14 | Mystic Confluence | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: • Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
trans-unit.target: •除非目标咒语的操控者支付{3}，否则反击之。

trans-unit.resname: C15·14 | Mystic Confluence | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: • Return target creature to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: •将目标生物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: C15·14 | Mystic Confluence | Card Text | Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: • Draw a card.

trans-unit.resname: C15·15 | Synthetic Destiny | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Synthetic Destiny

trans-unit.resname: C15·15 | Synthetic Destiny | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile all creatures you control. At the beginning of the next end step, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal that many creature cards, put all creature cards revealed this way onto the battlefield, then shuffle the rest of the revealed cards into your library.
trans-unit.target: 放逐所有由你操控的生物。在下一个结束步骤开始时，从你的牌库顶开始展示牌，直到展示出等量的生物牌为止，将所有以此法展示出的生物牌放进战场，然后将其余展示的牌洗入你的牌库。

Exile the tokens at end of combat.)\nWhenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.
trans-unit.target: 繁影（每当此生物攻击时，对防御牌手之外的每位对手而言，你可以将一个衍生物横置放进战场且正对该牌手或由他操控的某个鹏洛客进行攻击，该衍生物为此生物的复制品。在战斗结束时，放逐这些衍生物。）每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，该牌手弃一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: C15·17 | Corpse Augur | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, you draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the number of creature cards in target player's graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME死去时，你抓X张牌且失去X点生命，X为目标牌手坟墓场中的生物牌数量。

trans-unit.resname: C15·18 | Daxos's Torment | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Daxos's Torment

trans-unit.resname: C15·18 | Daxos's Torment | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Constellation — Whenever CARDNAME or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, CARDNAME becomes a 5/5 Demon creature with flying and haste in addition to its other types until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 星彩～每当CARDNAME或另一个结界在你的操控下进战场时，直到回合结束，CARDNAME成为5/5，具飞行与敏捷异能的恶魔生物，且仍具有原本类别。

trans-unit.resname: C15·19 | Deadly Tempest | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Deadly Tempest

trans-unit.resname: C15·19 | Deadly Tempest | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy all creatures. Each player loses life equal to the number of creatures they controlled that were destroyed this way.
trans-unit.target: 消灭所有生物。每位牌手各失去若干生命，其数量等同于由他操控的生物中，以此法被消灭的数量。

trans-unit.resname: C15·20 | Dread Summons | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dread Summons

trans-unit.resname: C15·20 | Dread Summons | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each player mills X cards. For each creature card put into a graveyard this way, you create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
trans-unit.target: 每位牌手各磨X张牌。每以此法将一张生物牌置入坟墓场，你便派出一个已横置的2/2黑色灵俑衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: C15·21 | Scourge of Nel Toth | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Scourge of Nel Toth

trans-unit.resname: C15·21 | Scourge of Nel Toth | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nYou may cast CARDNAME from your graveyard by paying {B}{B} and sacrificing two creatures rather than paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 飞行你可以支付{B}{B}并牺牲两个生物来从你的坟墓场施放CARDNAME，而非支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: C15·22 | Thief of Blood | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Thief of Blood

trans-unit.resname: C15·22 | Thief of Blood | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nAs CARDNAME enters the battlefield, remove all counters from all permanents. CARDNAME enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each counter removed this way.
trans-unit.target: 飞行于CARDNAME进战场时，移去所有永久物上的所有指示物。CARDNAME进战场时上面有数个+1/+1指示物，其数量为以此法移去之指示物数量。

trans-unit.resname: C15·24 | Awaken the Sky Tyrant | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When a source an opponent controls deals damage to you, sacrifice CARDNAME. If you do, create a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: 当由对手操控的任一来源对你造成伤害时，牺牲CARDNAME。若你如此作，则将一个5/5红色，具飞行异能的龙衍生生物放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: C15·25 | Dream Pillager | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, exile that many cards from the top of your library. Until end of turn, you may cast spells from among those exiled cards.

trans-unit.resname: C15·26 | Fiery Confluence | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: • CARDNAME deals 2 damage to each opponent.

trans-unit.resname: C15·26 | Fiery Confluence | Card Text | Paragraph 4

trans-unit.resname: C15·29 | Mizzix's Mastery | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile target card that's an instant or sorcery from your graveyard. For each card exiled this way, copy it, and you may cast the copy without paying its mana cost. Exile CARDNAME.

trans-unit.source: For each creature your opponents control, create a 4/4 green Phyrexian Beast creature token. Each of those tokens fights a different one of those creatures.
trans-unit.target: 所有对手每操控一个生物，你便派出一个4/4绿色非瑞人／野兽衍生生物。这些衍生物各与该些生物之一互斗，且不能重复选择。

trans-unit.resname: C15·37 | Great Oak Guardian | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Great Oak Guardian

trans-unit.resname: C15·37 | Great Oak Guardian | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)\nReach\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, creatures target player controls get +2/+2 until end of turn. Untap them.
trans-unit.target: 闪现（你可以于你能够施放瞬间的时机下施放此咒语。）延势当CARDNAME进战场时，由目标牌手操控的生物得+2/+2直到回合结束。将它们重置。

trans-unit.resname: C15·38 | Pathbreaker Ibex | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Pathbreaker Ibex

trans-unit.resname: C15·38 | Pathbreaker Ibex | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, creatures you control gain trample and get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，直到回合结束，由你操控的生物获得践踏异能且得+X/+X，X为由你操控的生物中力量最大者的数值。

trans-unit.resname: C15·39 | Skullwinder | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Skullwinder

trans-unit.source: Deathtouch

trans-unit.resname: C15·39 | Skullwinder | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, return target card from your graveyard to your hand, then choose an opponent. That player returns a card from their graveyard to their hand.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，将目标牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上，然后选择一位对手。该牌手将一张牌从其坟墓场移回其手上。

trans-unit.source: Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once.

trans-unit.source: • Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature.
trans-unit.target: •在目标生物上放置两个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: • Return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.

trans-unit.resname: C15·40 | Verdant Confluence | Card Text | Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: • Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: •从你牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，将之横置放进战场，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Anya, Merciless Angel

trans-unit.resname: C15·41 | Anya, Merciless Angel | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nCARDNAME gets +3/+3 for each opponent whose life total is less than half their starting life total.\nAs long as an opponent's life total is less than half their starting life total, Anya has indestructible.
trans-unit.target: 飞行每有一位总生命小于起始总生命之一半的对手，CARDNAME便得+3/+3。只要某对手的总生命小于其起始总生命之一半，安雅便具有不灭异能。

trans-unit.source: Flying

trans-unit.resname: C15·42 | Arjun, the Shifting Flame | Card Text | Paragraph 2

trans-unit.target: 每当你施放咒语时，将你的手牌以任意顺序置于你的牌库底，然后抓等量的牌。

trans-unit.resname: C15·43 | Daxos the Returned | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Daxos the Returned

trans-unit.resname: C15·43 | Daxos the Returned | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, you get an experience counter.\n{1}{W}{B}: Create a white and black Spirit enchantment creature token. It has "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of experience counters you have."
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放结界咒语时，你获得一个经验指示物。 {1}{W}{B}：将一个白黑双色的精怪衍生结界生物放进战场。它具有「此生物之力量和防御力各等同于你具有的经验指示物数量。」

trans-unit.resname: C15·44 | Ezuri, Claw of Progress | Card Name

trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature with power 2 or less enters the battlefield under your control, you get an experience counter.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个力量等于或小于2的生物在你操控下进战场时，你得到一个经验指示物。

trans-unit.resname: C15·44 | Ezuri, Claw of Progress | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of combat on your turn, put X +1/+1 counters on another target creature you control, where X is the number of experience counters you have.

trans-unit.target: 连击，警戒每当你施放总法术力费用等于或大于5的生物咒语时，你获得一个经验指示物。你每有一个经验指示物，CARDNAME便得+1/+1。

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, choose target creature card in your graveyard. If that card's mana value is less than or equal to the number of experience counters you have, return it to the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your hand.
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，选择目标在你坟墓场中的生物牌。若该牌的法术力值等于或小于你具有的经验指示物数量，则将它移回战场。若否，则将它置于你手上。
